cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 19th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

privates.name: Standard Single Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: Private Room with 1 single bed, sleeps one person.
privates.labelDescription:
The King single bed room includes linen and towels along with heating and cooling. 
There are dedicated male and female shared bathroom facilities. 
We are open 7 nights for dinner and have 22 taps of beer to select from along with a free pool table.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Standard Twin Room Private Shared Bathroom
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:

privates.name: Deluxe Twin Room Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription:
The twin king single bedroom includes linen and towels along with heating and cooling. 
There is a fitted ensuite as well as smart TV in the room. 
We are open 7 nights for dinner and have 22 taps of beer to select from along with a free pool table.

paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.
